name: Clockwise (itch) (Diegovz01)
description:
CLOCKWISE is a game of coordination and fast reaction!

Pivot is in constant movement, 

Right arrow moves Green,  

Left arrow moves Pink,   

Spacebar gives the Pivot a booooost.   

Avoid all fuzzy things,  

Collect all rounded eyes,  

Do not overlap for too long.  

Reach the magical spingate,  

Repeat for a better ScOrE. 

Hope you like!

Made for the Global Game Jam 2022
